articles.title: Biden says Americans should not worry about nuclear war - Reuters
articles.description: Americans should not be worried about nuclear war, U.S. President Joe Biden said on Monday, the day after Russian President Vladimir Putin put Russia's nuclear deterrent on high alert amid Moscow's ongoing invasion of Ukraine.

articles.title: Bengaluru astronomers claim to disprove findings on first stars formed after Big Bang - Deccan Herald

articles.title: Ukraine invasion: U.S tells citizens to leave Russia immediately - Daily Post Nigeria
